body.p: Paragraphs BC133–BC177 outline the Board’s deliberations on the form that the impairment test for goodwill should take:

li.p: paragraphs BC137–BC159 discuss the requirements relating to the allocation of goodwill to cash‑generating units and the level at which goodwill is tested for impairment.
paragraphs BC160–BC170 discuss the requirements relating to the recognition and measurement of impairment losses for goodwill, including the frequency of impairment testing.
paragraphs BC171–BC177 discuss the requirements relating to the timing of goodwill impairment tests.
